thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 7 de 698
thread.title: Unhappy

author: Unhappy
title: Unhappy
text:
While the rental price seems ok the fuel & refuelling charges are a matrix so cannot establish the exact cost before you hire the car.
The problem is when you have a full/empty fuel policy you must pay for a full fuel tank plus a fuelling charge on arrival but you cannot be clear on the amount by looking at the website so must await turning up at Goldcar before knowing what they will decide to charge
